comment.body:
I would recommend to backup users.json file from time to time to safe location and also backup it before using multiuser plugin! If you have problems manipulating with sites in multiuser mode, check [this](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:2_1pxo5AKTZoxWBdvAZsC2dR7MFHe5bFXcr#comment_3_1pxo5AKTZoxWBdvAZsC2dR7MFHe5bFXcr) and [this](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1521308711_128dbVaHobAMsFW25rUVyFxwdCvvfkidzT#comment_1141_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj).

By the way, here is similar tutorial: [[Tutorial] How To Configure ZeroNet To Work With Multiple Users](/1648uDJu8HaSjiYR6p8KJMGtKGQyUdFNqS/?Post:11:[Tutorial]+How+To+Configure+ZeroNet+To+Work+With+Multiple+Users)
